name: test_e2e_with_logs[318_CMD_PIPE_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_PIPE_005` |
| **Name** | Config file search and read via pipe |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | pipe |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `find / -name '*.conf' | xargs cat`
- **Encoded**: `find%20%2F%20-name%20%27%2A.conf%27%20%7C%20xargs%20cat`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 02:29:23.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=CMD_PIPE_005-1769912963121-vryfe pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_005 uri=/?q=find%20%2F%20-name%20%27%2A.conf%27%20%7C%20xargs%20cat client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
